name_of_ordered_mutable_list.name: What is a ordered mutable list called?

create_a_ordered_mutable_list.code:
type Definite is array (Integer range 1 .. 10) of Integer;A1 : Definite; 
 type Indefinite is array (Integer range <>) of Integer; A2 : Indefinite (1 .. 20);
create_a_ordered_mutable_list.comment: Method 1 creates array of size 1 to 10 and is fixed size. Method 2 creates array with Integer range, where range is indefinite i.e we can change the size of array.
create_a_ordered_mutable_list.name: Create the list

ordered_mutable_list_start_number.comment: In other programming languages, like Java and python where list indices work on pointers and references, in Ada, we the programmer decide what the index type should be. It can be of any type, just change the type inside the parenthesis.
ordered_mutable_list_start_number.name: What number does it start at?

ordered_mutable_list_can_be_inserted_in_.name: Can you insert into the middle of it?

access_element_in_ordered_mutable_list.comment: Here index start from 1, so to access value of 1st element in array do V(index)
access_element_in_ordered_mutable_list.name: Access element by index

insert_into_beginning_of_ordered_mutable.comment: Method 1,concatenate and save the values in new array. In method 2, V is a Vector and V is prepended with value 20. For method 2, you need Ada.Containers.Vectors container.
insert_into_beginning_of_ordered_mutable.name: Insert element at beginning

insert_into_end_of_ordered_mutable_list.comment: Method 1 concatenates and save the values in new array. In method 2, V is a Vector and V is appended with value 20. For method 2, you need Ada.Containers.Vectors container.
insert_into_end_of_ordered_mutable_list.name: Insert element at end

insert_into_middle_of_ordered_mutable_li.comment: In method 1, to insert value in middle of the array, you can concatenate the array with known range and save the values in new array. In method 2, V is a vector.To insert element in middle in the vector, define Cursor C and then value to be inserted before C. For method 2, you need Ada.Containers.Vectors container.
insert_into_middle_of_ordered_mutable_li.name: Insert element in middle

name_of_unordered_mutable_list.name: What is a unordered mutable list called?

unordered_mutable_list_start_number.name: What number does it start at?

unordered_mutable_list_can_be_appended.comment: S.Insert(value) raises Constraint_Error if value appended is already in the list
unordered_mutable_list_can_be_appended.name: Can you append to it?

unordered_mutable_list_can_be_inserted_i.name: Can you insert into the middle of it?

name_of_ordered_immutable_list.name: What is a ordered immutable list called?

ordered_immutable_list_start_number.name: What number does it start at?

name_of_unordered_immutable_list.name: What is a unordered immutable list called?

unordered_immutable_list_start_number.name: What number does it start at?

name_of_mutable_hashed_list.name: What is a mutable hashed list called?

erase_element_from_mutable_hashed_list.name: Erase an element from the list

name_of_immutable_hashed_list.name: What is an immutable hashed list called?

erase_element_from_immutable_hashed_list.name: Erase an element from the list

get_all_keys_from_mutable_set.name: Get all keys

get_all_values_from_mutable_set.name: Get all values

find_element_by_value.name: Find/search for an element by value

find_minimum_element.name: Find the minimum value in a list

find_maximum_element.name: Find the maximum value in a list

convert_list_to_string.name: Convert a list to a string

concatenate_two_lists.comment: We can concatenate more 2 list by adding operator '&'. It must be noted that T should have the array size larger or equal to the arrays which is being concatenated.
concatenate_two_lists.name: Concatenate two lists together

duplicate_a_list.comment: index of array A2 must be less than (or equal) to A1, or else an exception is raised.
duplicate_a_list.name: Duplicate a list

duplicate_subset_of_list.comment: to copy a subset of an array, the variable must be of type array and the programmer must specify the index of the array. It must be noted that both range specified in A1 and A2 should be of equal length.
duplicate_subset_of_list.name: Duplicate a portion/subset of a list

do_two_lists_match_exactly.name: Do two lists match every element?

do_two_lists_contain_same_items.name: Do two lists contain all the same items?

does_list_satisfy_some_expression.name: Does a list satisfy some expression?

does_list_not_satisfy_an_expression.name: Does a list entirely not satisfy an expression?

sort_list.comment: Ada.Containers.Vectors is required for above function to work.
sort_list.name: Sort a list

reverse_list.comment: Ada.Containers.Vectors is required for above function to work.
reverse_list.name: Reverse order of list elements

filter.name: Filter a list based on criteria
